description.agricraft.biomesoplenty.glow: A flower glowing in the dark.
A mushroom glowing in the dark.
description.agricraft.biomesoplenty.lave: A flower with multiple purple blossoms and a refreshing scent.
description.agricraft.biomesoplenty.oran: Doesn't it look like the sun?
description.agricraft.biomesoplenty.pink: This flower is generally found near ponds or lakes.
Its gigantic blooms are loved by bees, butterflies and hummingbirds.
description.agricraft.biomesoplenty.rose: One of the most popular and widely cultivated groups of flowering plants.
description.agricraft.biomesoplenty.toad: A type of edible mushroom found in the forest.
description.agricraft.biomesoplenty.viol: A delicate flower growing in meadows.
description.agricraft.biomesoplenty.wilt: That's what happens when you don't water your plants.
